original: Fixpoint poly (A : Set) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) {struct n} : Set := match n with | O => {0} | S n => {fun c => match c with | 0 => 0 | S c => poly A eqA n end} end. Fixpoint spolyp (A : Set) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (a b : poly A eqA n) {struct n} : poly A eqA n := match n return (poly A eqA n) with | O => a | S n => match a with | 0 => b | S a => spolyp A eqA n (S a) (spolyp A eqA n a b) end end.
